TextView.android:text: Welcome To India's No.1 Private University Shoolini University

Highlights No.1 Private University in India (Times Higher Education World University Rankings and QS World University Rankings). No.1 Research University (QS World University Rankings, Asia). All courses are NAAC accredited and approved by UGC, BCI, and PCI. Faculty from top organisations like McKinsey, PwC, HSBC, Citi IBM, Microsoft, IIT, IIM, IISc, Oxford, Stanford, Cambridge, and UC Berkeley. Faculty from top organisations like McKinsey, PwC, HSBC, Citi IBM, Microsoft, IIT, IIM, IISc, Oxford, Stanford, Cambridge, and UC Berkeley. ‘Mission 130’: 100% placements with 30% in top organisations. Top industry partners include IBM, Cognizant, Genpact, Mercer, Biocon, Cipla, Hindustan Unilever, L'Oréal, Deloitte, Adani, Accenture, and more. Students receive attractive research and overseas fellowships. One-Student-One-Patent policy that resulted in filing of 1500+ patents so far. 500+ Scholarships to deserving candidates for PhD, Postgraduate, and Undergraduate programs. Received Government grants like PURSE, SERB, DST FIST and more. Received Government grants like PURSE, SERB, DST FIST and more. Houses the XR and AI Research Centre and BOSCH Centre.Partnership with the ICT Academy, IBM, Microsoft, AWS Academy, Ikigai Lab, AADDOO, NASSCOM, KPMG, NHRDN, and LIBF.
